short_desc: Implements several different biological neuron models and accompanying tools in python under a common framework
long_desc: This project implements a variety of neuron models under a common framework in python. Sympy is used for the model definitions, which makes it very easy to export the models to a LaTeX doc. Tools included allow for spiketrain extraction, generation of frequency-current curves, phase plots (where applicable), bifurcation plots, and other things.
